title: Im kicked from my Club
body: Hello, i had a club with like 10+ ppl in it and after the problem with Clubs i got kicked for no reason,since the rest players are in it.How can that be fixed ?People see me inside the club but offline.

replies.body:
I too need some help.

Blunicorns of love is the club.

<ofluv> should be the tag. It doesnt show up in my client, but it doeson my clanmates
Good to go.  I've checked and your clubs looks to be in good health!
@Porocles could I get some help with my clan tag too? NIDH is the clan ------/----- is my username.
I've edited out your account information as it's not something you want to share with others.  Keep it safe and secure!  Your club should be good to go now!
I reported this but as well a few weeks ago and no fix yet. Please help. DADCO is the club.

I'm having a similar issue. I can't see my club but all the other members still can. And they can't add me back. It's on NA server. Any help would be appreciated.
Club name: Dahk Wadah 
Tag: ]^:
Can you relog for me, and try again?  Everything should be fine now, but let me know!

Any chance you could help me out as well? I seem to be having the same issue on NA.

Club name: RepThe6
Tag: Rep6
Checked it out!  You'll need to relog, but everything looks okay now.  :D  Let me know if not.
All seems right. Thank you for your help.
I was also kicked from my club anglesofdarkness Tag F.OX,

Could you help me out too? :)

clan tag is TCofB

was the owner of club. clan still exists, can invite myself back to the club

Club name: xinelo
Club tag: XiNeL

Finally found this discussion!
It happened to me too!
Club: #CARPET
TAG: ÉDER

Similar for me, glad I found this thread! Club name: Everything for Scuttle
Tag: [EFS] Server NA
I was the leader I'm pretty sure but I was kicked for some reason and I am not able to get back in

I am also having the same issue. 

Club name: KnightsoftheLeagueTable

I'm glad I came across this thread, it wasn't too easy to find. But I'm having the same problem. Is there anyway you guys could restore things for me?
Username: FithSucker
Club: Brick Killed A Guy
Tag: BKAG
Hello? =[

There was an [issue recently ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016)where club owners couldn't see their club, even though they were still in it.  What the tag and name of your club?  I'd be happy to look!

Blaze Central
531BC
If I could get back in, that would be greatly appreciated!

PopCornBbQ
Yolo™ check it plz
Unfortunately, I was unable to locate the club with this name and tag.
Its ok..ill make another thnx for the effort.

Is there any way you could help out my Fiance as well? He's supposed to be the leader of our club, but it never connects him on log-in.

His screen name is Trebelz.
Club Name: A List
Club Tag: ARank
Looked into this, and everything is good to go now.  Congrats!

Hello I am still experiencing this issue. I am the club leader. Can you help me too?

Club Name: MentosPentaStealers
Club Tag: T4S

Thank you in advance!
Should be good to go!  Relog first, though.  Let me know if you still have any issues with this.
Its finally working, thank you so much!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

seems this is the got to thread for the solution for this issue. if you would be so kind as to aid me as well?

 (#thesquad 2.0  the hashtag would not show up so i added the ( to make sure the name was accurate.

(WPG)

It still doesn't work for me. A friend told me that I appear to be online but in my movil. Actually I have the app for android and it's working there but not in the client.
Should I submit a ticket for support?

Same problem here, Can I get some help? :3

Club Name: Raining Blood
Club Tag: Miau

i am also having this issue, ever since the issue with clubs, i (the creator of the club) have not been able to see the club chat room, nor have i had my club tag. my friends see me as still being in the club, but offline at all times. any help would be appreciated :)
NA server (not sure if listing server is necessary, since the issue is on this account, but i figured i'd list it anyway)
Club name: The Muffin Factory
Club tag: TMFac
Good to go.  Can you relog and check again?

As long as we're doing this, could you please double check mine? I created the club initially, although I gave ownership to someone else, and I'm actually not sure if I was kicked from it, the club was disbanded, or if it's one of the issues the others are having.

Club Name: Pudding's Feeders
Club Tag: >G_G:

I *think* the colon is a part of the tag, at least.
It doesn't appear that you're in this club.  You'll want to hit up the owner for an invite.  Good luck!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0EEEfWth,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-11-15T20:57:31.871+0000)
>
> Good to go.  Can you relog and check again?

oh my, that was fast! the club and club tag are working perfectly now, thank you so much! ^_^

Can you could help me out as well? I seem to be having the same issue.

Club name: theGooonSquad!
Club tag: >GNZ<
You're set!  Everything looks good with your club now.
